data.value: The closed beta test has ended.
<align="left">We are currently in preparation for the closed beta test, and we thank you for your patience.\n\n- FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS Development Team</align>

<align="left">We, the developers of FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS,
would like to thank you for your participation in the closed beta test
and ask that you share your feedback in our questionnaire!
